interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce
Review Date: 2020/04/03
Store: Bioré
Product Description: ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'}
Review Text: The Bioré Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is slightly like a watery jelly texture and goes on smoothly for washing away dirt and makeup on your face. You simply pump some of the cleaner in the palm of your hand and then massage it gently on your face to clear away the makeup -  then rinse your whole face with water. The scent is mild but very nice. When finished you will not feel any sticky residue. I love the guard on the pump that allows you to put it on the pump when you are not using it so little fingers cannot spread the jelly around when you are not looking nor can the pump squirt out when the bottle falls over or when you are traveling. This product was made in Japan.
Review Title: Love The Guard For The Cap
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.']
{'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'}
The Bioré Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is slightly like a watery jelly texture and goes on smoothly for washing away dirt and makeup on your face. You simply pump some of the cleaner in the palm of your hand and then massage it gently on your face to clear away the makeup -  then rinse your whole face with water. The scent is mild but very nice. When finished you will not feel any sticky residue. I love the guard on the pump that allows you to put it on the pump when you are not using it so little fingers cannot spread the jelly around when you are not looking nor can the pump squirt out when the bottle falls over or when you are traveling. This product was made in Japan.
Love The Guard For The Cap
profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Preferred Product Type:** Makeup removers and cleansers, particularly gentle, non-greasy options.
- **Quality Indicators:** Strong preference for products that effectively remove makeup and impurities without leaving a residue; emphasizes moisturizing properties.
- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** Enjoys mild and pleasant scents in skincare products.
- **Texture Preference:** Appreciates lightweight, easy-to-use formulations with a unique texture (e.g., jelly consistency).
- **Product Features:** Values practical features like protective packaging (e.g., pump guard) for convenience and safety, especially when traveling or in households with children.
- **Cultural Influences:** Shows a preference for products originating from Japan, indicating an inclination towards J-Beauty standards.
- **Satisfaction Standards:** Prefers products with a high satisfaction rating and emphasizes the importance of effective, user-friendly design. 

The user appears to prioritize effectiveness, ease of use, and safety in skincare products, with a leaning towards Japanese beauty innovations.
